div.div: Bayesian skyline plot reconstruction of past population size trajectory for the Upper Subansiri population.
div.p: The plot is the product of female effective population size (f N e ) and mutation rate ( Î¼) through time, assuming a substitution rate of 0.1643 substitutions per nucleotide per million years [29]. The lower and upper 95% confidence interval for the Upper Subansiri TMRCA is also shown. LGM, Last Glacial Maximum, approximately 18 to 20 thousand years before present.
